notes: Refer to the Academic Regulations for details on how to include a minor in your degree.
Students must complete at least 6 units at the 3000 or 4000 level in anthropology.
Optional 3rd year courses may include: ANT 3307, ANT 3340, ANT 3341, ANT 3342, ANT 3344, ANT 3345.

courses: ANT3340 | Anthropology of Latin America and the Caribbean
ANT3345 | Anthropology of the Maghreb and the Middle East
Elective | 15 units in any ANT courses

requirements.description: 6 optional course units in anthropology (ANT) at the 3000 or 4000 level
courses: Elective | 6 units in 3000 or 4000-level ANT courses
